plot: Grass Roots", a six-episode mockumentary which centers on downtrodden club manager Harry Pickles and reveals a comical, honest and often grim portrayal of life in the lower tiers of English...
plot_en: Grass Roots", a six-episode mockumentary which centers on downtrodden club manager Harry Pickles and reveals a comical, honest and often grim portrayal of life in the lower tiers of English...
plot_es: Grass Roots", a six-episode mockumentary which centers on downtrodden club manager Harry Pickles and reveals a comical, honest and often grim portrayal of life in the lower tiers of English...
title: Grass Roots
